segment.source: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Server Infrastructure
segment.target: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Server Infrastructure

segment.source: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Server Infrastructure
segment.target: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Server Infrastructure

segment.source: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Server Infrastructure
segment.target: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Server Infrastructure

segment.source: You can install Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Server features in different configurations by using one to five servers.
segment.target: You can install Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Server features in different configurations by using one to five servers.

segment.source: Generally, you should use a configuration of three to five servers for production environments, depending on your scalability needs.
segment.target: Generally, you should use a configuration of three to five servers for production environments, depending on your scalability needs.

segment.source: For more information about performance scalability of MBAM and recommended deployment topologies, see the MBAM Scalability and High-Availability Guide White Paper.
segment.target: For more information about performance scalability of MBAM and recommended deployment topologies, see the MBAM Scalability and High-Availability Guide White Paper.

segment.source: Deploy all MBAM 1.0 on a single server
segment.target: Deploy all MBAM 1.0 on a single server

segment.source: In this configuration, all MBAM features are installed on a single server.
segment.target: In this configuration, all MBAM features are installed on a single server.

segment.source: This deployment topology for MBAM server infrastructure will support up to 21,000 MBAM client computers.
segment.target: This deployment topology for MBAM server infrastructure will support up to 21,000 MBAM client computers.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: This configuration is supported, but we recommend it for testing only.
segment.target: This configuration is supported, but we recommend it for testing only.

segment.source: The procedures in this section describe the full installation of the MBAM features on a single server.
segment.target: The procedures in this section describe the full installation of the MBAM features on a single server.

segment.source: How to Install and Configure MBAM on a Single Server
segment.target: How to Install and Configure MBAM on a Single Server

segment.source: Deploy MBAM 1.0 on distributed servers
segment.target: Deploy MBAM 1.0 on distributed servers

segment.source: MBAM features can be installed in different configurations, depending on your scalability needs.
segment.target: MBAM features can be installed in different configurations, depending on your scalability needs.

segment.source: For more information about how to plan for MBAM server feature deployment, see Planning for MBAM 1.0 Server Deployment.
segment.target: For more information about how to plan for MBAM server feature deployment, see Planning for MBAM 1.0 Server Deployment.

segment.source: The procedures in this section describe the full installation of the MBAM features on distributed servers.
segment.target: The procedures in this section describe the full installation of the MBAM features on distributed servers.

segment.source: Three-computer configuration
segment.target: Three-computer configuration

segment.source: The following diagram displays the three-computer deployment topology for MBAM.
segment.target: The following diagram displays the three-computer deployment topology for MBAM.

segment.source: We recommend this topology for production environments that support up to 55,000 MBAM Clients.
segment.target: We recommend this topology for production environments that support up to 55,000 MBAM Clients.

segment.source: mbam three computer deployment topology
segment.target: mbam three computer deployment topology

segment.source: In this configuration, MBAM features are installed in the following configuration:
segment.target: In this configuration, MBAM features are installed in the following configuration:

segment.source: Recovery and Hardware Database, Compliance and Audit Database, and Compliance and Audit Reports are installed on a server.
segment.target: Recovery and Hardware Database, Compliance and Audit Database, and Compliance and Audit Reports are installed on a server.

segment.source: Administration and Monitoring Server feature is installed on a server.
segment.target: Administration and Monitoring Server feature is installed on a server.

segment.source: MBAM Group Policy template is installed on a computer that is capable of modifying Group Policy Objects (GPO).
segment.target: MBAM Group Policy template is installed on a computer that is capable of modifying Group Policy Objects (GPO).

segment.source: Four-computer configuration
segment.target: Four-computer configuration

segment.source: The following diagram displays the four-computer deployment topology for MBAM.
segment.target: The following diagram displays the four-computer deployment topology for MBAM.

segment.source: We recommended this topology for production environments that support up to 110,000 MBAM Clients.
segment.target: We recommended this topology for production environments that support up to 110,000 MBAM Clients.

segment.source: mbam four computer deployment topology.
segment.target: mbam four computer deployment topology.

segment.source: In this configuration, MBAM features are installed in the following configuration:
segment.target: In this configuration, MBAM features are installed in the following configuration:

segment.source: Recovery and Hardware Database, Compliance and Audit Database, and Compliance and Audit Reports are installed on a server.
segment.target: Recovery and Hardware Database, Compliance and Audit Database, and Compliance and Audit Reports are installed on a server.

segment.source: Administration and Monitoring Server feature is installed on a server that is configured in a Network Load Balancing (NLB) Server Cluster.
segment.target: Administration and Monitoring Server feature is installed on a server that is configured in a Network Load Balancing (NLB) Server Cluster.

segment.source: MBAM Group Policy template is installed on a computer that is capable of modifying the Group Policy Objects.
segment.target: MBAM Group Policy template is installed on a computer that is capable of modifying the Group Policy Objects.

segment.source: Five-computer configuration
segment.target: Five-computer configuration

segment.source: The following diagram displays the five-computer deployment topology for MBAM.
segment.target: The following diagram displays the five-computer deployment topology for MBAM.

segment.source: We recommend this topology for production environments that support up to 135,000 MBAM Clients.
segment.target: We recommend this topology for production environments that support up to 135,000 MBAM Clients.

segment.source: mbam five computer deployment topology.
segment.target: mbam five computer deployment topology.

segment.source: In this configuration, MBAM features are installed in the following configuration:
segment.target: In this configuration, MBAM features are installed in the following configuration:

segment.source: Recovery and Hardware Database is installed on a server.
segment.target: Recovery and Hardware Database is installed on a server.

segment.source: The Compliance and Audit Database and Compliance and Audit Reports are installed on a server.
segment.target: The Compliance and Audit Database and Compliance and Audit Reports are installed on a server.

segment.source: Administration and Monitoring Server feature is installed on a server that is configured in a Network Load Balancing (NLB) Server Cluster.
segment.target: Administration and Monitoring Server feature is installed on a server that is configured in a Network Load Balancing (NLB) Server Cluster.

segment.source: MBAM Group Policy template is installed on a computer that is capable of modifying Group Policy Objects.
segment.target: MBAM Group Policy template is installed on a computer that is capable of modifying Group Policy Objects.
